body_html:
@karankaw : That would be great. Could I trouble you (or any other volunteer) to send a PR? (I figured some information from folks who work in Windows more regularly than I do will be better).

The change would be to this file: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/docs_src/install/install_java.md
